document.author: JulSa_
document.text: Voici la mise à jour PlayStation Store du 10 Novembre 2010 . On notera l’arrivé de Grandia sur PSone, mais surtout l’absence de démo PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Offres spéciales (Disponibles jusqu’au 24 novembre) TMNT: Turtle in Time Re-Shelled (prix initial – 9.99 € maintenant – 6.99 €) Cell Factor: Psychokinetic Wars (prix initial – 9.99 € maintenant – 6.99 €) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 12 – Battle of Forli (prix initial – 3.99 € maintenant – 2.49 €) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 13 – Bonfire of the Vanities (prix initial – 3.99 € maintenant – 2.49 €) Assassin’s Creed II: Sequence 13 – Bonfire of the Vanities & Secret Locations (prix initial – 6.99 € maintenant – 3.99 €) Assassin’s Creed: Bloodlines (PSP) (prix initial – 29.99 € maintenant – 19.99 €) Tom Clancy’s EndWar ( PSP) (prix initial – 19.99 € maintenant – 9.99 €) ChessMaster: The Art of Learning (PSP) (prix initial – 19.99 € maintenant – 9.99 €) Mystery of the Crystal Portal (mini) (prix initial – 4.99 € maintenant – 2.99 €) Réduction permanente du prix Harvest Moon: Hero of Leaf Valley – maintenant 24.99 € Jeux téléchargeables (PS3) Crescent Pale Mist (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype & The Last Chapter Bundle (14.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 Jeux téléchargeables (PSP) WWE Smackdown vs. Raw 2011 (39.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 NBA 2K11 (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Jeux PSone (PS3 et PSP) Grandia (7.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 minis (PS3 et PSP) 3, 2, 1… Supercrash! (2.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Jewel Keepers: Easter Island (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Application (PS3) MUBI (gratuit) Rating: PEGI 18 Maitenant disponible eu Suisse Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) EyePet
